summary: The diff modifies `frontend/src/pages/PositionRecovery.tsx` to wire the Refresh button to a real async action. The implementation imports `getPositionRisk` from `binanceAccountService.ts`, imports `hasCredentials` from `binanceAuth.ts`, uses `generateRecoveryStrategies` from `positionRecoveryEngine`, adds loading state, credentials checking, error toast handling, and a `positionRiskToTrade` converter. The file summary confirms: loading spinner, credentials warning tooltip, error toast handling, and fetching via `getPositionRisk()` on Refresh. All major acceptance criteria appear to be addressed.
